name: Hungry Snake
description:
Snake is a classic video game which became popular at the beginning of 70’s. Nowadays it has changed beyond recognition! Play Hungry Snake for a refreshed take on the classic and see it on something a little more powerful than your calculator.

Dodge the obstacles by tapping the arrows on your screen and don't let Cynthia the Snake die. She is always hungry and her health will constantly deplete. Eat fruit to keep her health bar up, particularly the apples. Collect multiples of the same fruit for extra bonuses and score boosts. 

Watch out for spiders and lava; well known adversaries to any snake. They'll take down Cynthia's health a lot. And don't run into any rocks; they'll stop a snake dead in its tracks!

Game features: 
★ 4 fruit collectibles
★ One big open world full of adventure
★ Rocks, grass, and lava
★ Evil spiders
★ Beautiful updated graphics
★ Unique music
★ One big open world full of adventure
★ Easy snake controls
★ Score tracking
★ Completely free
★ Play as much as you like, no lives or energy to worry about

Download and play Hungry Snake today for some easy casual fun!

Check us out!
